actions.description: The chosen makes one Handaxe attack and two Shortsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage. Hit or Miss: The handaxe magically returns to the chosen's hand immediately after a ranged attack.
actions.name: Handaxe

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword
